MoreClassRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
MoreClassRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

MoreClassRelics:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
MoreClassRelics:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
MoreClassRelics:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

MoreClassRelics:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
MoreClassRelics:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

MoreClassRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
MoreClassRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !MoreClassRelics:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

MoreClassRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
MoreClassRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !MoreClassRelics:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
